%d%%
Login We would like to make it easier for you to access our digital products and are therefore changing our registration procedure in a two-stage process. First, please enter your current Subscription ID and password. In a second step you will be asked to log in with a valid e-mail address (taz ID) and a password of your choice. That\'s it! From now on you can only log in with your taz ID. If you already have a taz ID, please log in here.

subscription Subscription ID is not valid. Subscription ID needs to be provided.
email Email can\'t be empty. Must be an email address

surname Please enter your surname
subscription ID
confirm password Username can\'t be empty. Please use your tazId or subscription id.
password Password can\'t be empty Passwords do not match

Your subscription is currently inactive (e.g. because it expired). Please contact our service:
To use the new app you need to login with your email and a self-elected password. If you already have an account on taz.de please insert your credentials here. Did you forget your password? Click here I accept the terms and conditions, as well as the notes on revocation and privacy. Login I already have an account I don\'t have an account yet
Your email address is already used by another subscription id. Try different login credentials. Or contact our support service:
You forgot your password? Insert your email address or subscription id and we will send you an email on how to proceed. Send and request link Invalid subscription ID
The email has been sent. Please check your inbox. If you can not find it please check the spam folder as well. Back to login/registration
Login successful. Back to the article Back to the settings
Currently no subscription is connected with your account. Connect existing subscription Create test subscription
You can try the digital taz for 14 days: If you already have an taz.de account (to comment on articles or use the archive) with email address and password please enter them here> I accept the terms and conditions, as well as the information on revocation and privacy.
Thanks for your registration! We sent you an email. Please open it and confirm your address. As soon as it has been confirmed you will be able to use the new taz app.
Thank you for your registration. Enjoy the new digital taz!
Your subscription is already connected to another account. Try other credentials Or reach out to our helpdesk:
